channel.title: Cabal Online
channel.description:
http://cabal.ogplanet.com/main.og
You should play it because it is possibly the best game ever created. It is free and better than WoW imo.
[IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/scwah4.png[/img] [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/69pzl2.png[/img] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/scwah4.png[/img] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/4hurko.png[/img]
If you want to play Cabal with me. Hit me up on Skype
Skype user: drcrazy303
Cabal user: Butterscape
[b]If you don't live in Canada or US:[/b]
South America http://www.gamemaxx.com.br/Cabal/home
Europe http://www.cabalonline.com
Asian ones, but too many for me to list. If anyone needs them let me know.

item.title: Cabal Online
item.dc:creator: @cocoa cocoa
item.description:
@cocoa wrote:

[quote=“ephemeral, post:13, topic:279580”][quote author=cocoa link=topic=368953.msg2797056#msg2797056 date=1243126291]

just another free combat based mmorpg where you pretty much do nothing but fight monsters?

this.
[/quote]

I guess that I’m not going to try it now… most games that doesn’t have player-player combat aren’t fun for me :([/quote]

It has PvP and PvE. I’m just saying it doesn’t have like fletching n shit.

Read full topic

item.title: Cabal Online
item.dc:creator: @hasumon hasumon
item.description:
@hasumon wrote:

jme:

But yeah those koreans come out with a game like this everyday. They are all kind of the same. Basically fight a lot of monsters, do the odd quest, and collect better items. There’s not much else to them.

Then let’s play runescape together! /sarcasm

Read full topic

item.title: Cabal Online
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:

just another free combat based mmorpg where you pretty much do nothing but fight monsters?

this.
[/quote]

I guess that I’m not going to try it now… most games that doesn’t have player-player combat aren’t fun for me :([/quote]

It might have PvP look into it.

But yeah those koreans come out with a game like this everyday. They are all kind of the same. Basically fight a lot of monsters, do the odd quest, and collect better items. There’s not much else to them.

item.title: Cabal Online
item.dc:creator: @cocoa cocoa
item.description:
@cocoa wrote:

[quote=“cocoa, post:8, topic:279580”][quote author=wayzey link=topic=368953.msg2795878#msg2795878 date=1243071173]
Looks just like rappelz but the models aren’t rendered as much and have much sharper edges.

I would download BUUTTT it’s Canada and USA only :’(
[/quote]

I’ve got it rendering at the lowest detail possible to increase speed.[/quote]

Also, they have it for the rest of the countries.

South America
http://www.gamemaxx.com.br/Cabal/home

Europe
http://www.cabalonline.com

Asian ones, but too many for me to list.

Read full topic

item.title: Cabal Online
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

This looks like one of those games you can use Cheat Engine on (Eg. Last Chaos). Not that I have any room to talk, but some of the models in that picture look terrible. Nice textures though.

Another thing: It’s just another spinoff of World of Warcraft, or any of the other games like this). But I guess it does have its benefit of being free.

And finally, one last sarcastic remark: “RLY? PALY AN0THER GAYM OTHR THEN RUN ESCAPE?/”

But for real, I might play. It looks ok.

Read full topic
